framework.name: Tool_based_on_Symfony_Console_2/12/15 10:53 AM_cc

command.name: bootstrap
command.help:
Creates default test suites and generates all requires files

Options:
--namespace(-ns)Namespace to add for actor classes and helpers
--actor(-a)Custom actor instead of Guy
--compatCodeception 1.x compatible setup
--customizeCustomize suite and actors creation
--help(-h)Display this help message
--quiet(-q)Do not output any message
--verbose(-v)Increase the verbosity of messages: 1 for normal output, 2 for more verbose output and 3 for debug
--version(-V)Display this application version
--ansiForce ANSI output
--no-ansiDisable ANSI output
--no-interaction(-n)Do not ask any interactive question

option.name: --namespace
option.help: Namespace to add for actor classes and helpers

option.name: --verbose
option.help: Increase the verbosity of messages: 1 for normal output, 2 for more verbose output and 3 for debug

option.name: --no-interaction
option.help: Do not ask any interactive question

command.name: help
command.help:
The help command displays help for a given command:

php /Users/toby/src/library/php/slim/slim-service-loader/vendor/bin/codecept help list

You can also output the help in other formats by using the --format option:

php /Users/toby/src/library/php/slim/slim-service-loader/vendor/bin/codecept help --format=xml list

To display the list of available commands, please use the list command.

Options:
--xmlTo output help as XML
--formatTo output help in other formats
--rawTo output raw command help
--help(-h)Display this help message
--quiet(-q)Do not output any message
--verbose(-v)Increase the verbosity of messages: 1 for normal output, 2 for more verbose output and 3 for debug
--version(-V)Display this application version
--ansiForce ANSI output
--no-ansiDisable ANSI output
--no-interaction(-n)Do not ask any interactive question

option.name: --format
option.help: To output help in other formats

option.name: --verbose
option.help: Increase the verbosity of messages: 1 for normal output, 2 for more verbose output and 3 for debug

option.name: --no-interaction
option.help: Do not ask any interactive question

command.name: list
command.help:
The list command lists all commands:

php /Users/toby/src/library/php/slim/slim-service-loader/vendor/bin/codecept list

You can also display the commands for a specific namespace:

php /Users/toby/src/library/php/slim/slim-service-loader/vendor/bin/codecept list test

You can also output the information in other formats by using the --format option:

php /Users/toby/src/library/php/slim/slim-service-loader/vendor/bin/codecept list --format=xml

It's also possible to get raw list of commands (useful for embedding command runner):

php /Users/toby/src/library/php/slim/slim-service-loader/vendor/bin/codecept list --raw

Options:
--xmlTo output list as XML
--rawTo output raw command list
--formatTo output list in other formats

option.name: --format
option.help: To output list in other formats

command.name: run
command.help:
Runs the test suites

Options:
--config(-c)Use custom path for config
--reportShow output in compact style
--htmlGenerate html with results
--xmlGenerate JUnit XML Log
--tapGenerate Tap Log
--jsonGenerate Json Log
--colorsUse colors in output
--no-colorsForce no colors in output (useful to override config file)
--silentOnly outputs suite names and final results
--stepsShow steps in output
--debug(-d)Show debug and scenario output
--coverageRun with code coverage
--coverage-htmlGenerate CodeCoverage HTML report in path
--coverage-xmlGenerate CodeCoverage XML report in file
--coverage-textGenerate CodeCoverage text report in file
--no-exitDon't finish with exit code
--group(-g)Groups of tests to be executed
--skip(-s)Skip selected suites
--skip-group(-sg)Skip selected groups
--envRun tests in selected environments.
--fail-fast(-f)Stop after first failure
--help(-h)Display this help message
--quiet(-q)Do not output any message
--verbose(-v)Increase the verbosity of messages: 1 for normal output, 2 for more verbose output and 3 for debug
--version(-V)Display this application version
--ansiForce ANSI output
--no-ansiDisable ANSI output
--no-interaction(-n)Do not ask any interactive question

option.name: --no-colors
option.help: Force no colors in output (useful to override config file)

option.name: --silent
option.help: Only outputs suite names and final results

option.name: --coverage-html
option.help: Generate CodeCoverage HTML report in path

option.name: --coverage-xml
option.help: Generate CodeCoverage XML report in file

option.name: --coverage-text
option.help: Generate CodeCoverage text report in file

option.name: --group
option.help: Groups of tests to be executed

option.name: --verbose
option.help: Increase the verbosity of messages: 1 for normal output, 2 for more verbose output and 3 for debug

option.name: --no-interaction
option.help: Do not ask any interactive question

command.help:

--path(-p)Use specified path as destination instead of default
--single-fileRender all scenarios to only one file

--no-ansiDisable ANSI output
